name: MYC_MESG_QUESR
description: This table stores information on questionnaires that have been attached to web based chart system (WMG) messages.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID used to identify a web based chart system message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number used to identify each row of read data associated with an individual web based chart system message record.

columns.name: ALLOW_QUESR_ID
columns.description: This stores the IDs of the questionnaires linked to this message.

columns.name: ALLOW_QUESR_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.
